description: Detailed overview with alerts for a single SPP-Server

targets.query: SELECT percentile("cpuUtil", 90) FROM "rp_days_14"."cpuram" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h)

panels.description:
95% Percentille / last 24h of each component memory usage
Max root storage usage  / last 24h of Server and vSnap
panels.title: SPP Catalog Space

panels.description: Duration of the last execution of selected jobs
panels.title: Housekeeping-Job Durations

targets.query: SELECT max("%idle") *-1 + 100 FROM "ssh_mpstat_cmd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m), "COMMAND"

panels.description:
This panel shows how much the dela did increase, leaving out going down again.
Good for noticing errors, even if they disappeared

targets.query: SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("errorCount") FROM $SPP_Server."rp_days_14"."sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("constant" = 'True')) GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("errorCount") FROM $SPP_Server.rp_days_14."sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("hourly" = 'True')) GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("errorCount") FROM $SPP_Server.rp_days_14."sppmon_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter AND ("daily" = 'True'))  GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("errorCount") FROM $SPP_Server.rp_days_14."sppmon_metrics" WHERE  $timeFilter AND ("all" = 'True')) GROUP BY time(1d)

SELECT sum(*) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("errorCount") FROM $SPP_Server.rp_days_14."sppmon_metrics" WHERE  $timeFilter AND ("daily" != 'True' AND "constant" != 'True' AND "all" != 'True' AND "hourly" != 'True')) GROUP BY time(1d)

panels.title: SPPmon Collection Errors (24h)

targets.query: SELECT PERCENTILE( *, 90) FROM (SELECT sum("%CPU") FROM "$SPP_Server"."rp_days_14"."processStats" WHERE $timeFilter AND  ("ssh_type" = 'SERVER') GROUP BY time(1s), "COMMAND") GROUP BY time($interval), "COMMAND"  fill(none)

SELECT PERCENTILE( *, 90) FROM (SELECT sum("%MEM") FROM "$SPP_Server"."rp_days_14"."processStats" WHERE $timeFilter AND  ("ssh_type" = 'SERVER')  GROUP BY time(1s), "COMMAND") GROUP BY time($interval), "COMMAND"  fill(none)

panels.description:
Sum of replicated bytes (VM) within the last 24h
Sum of transferred bytes (VM) within the last 24h
Sum of transferred bytes (Office365) within the last 24h
panels.title: Additional Statistics (Total of last 24h)

title: Multiple Server Overview
